description: Maximum stability pattern for in vivo applications
reference: Based on FDA-approved siRNA therapeutics (Onpattro, Givlaari)

2OMe.rationale: Complete 2'-O-methyl modification provides maximum nuclease resistance

PS.rationale: Phosphorothioate linkages at terminal dinucleotides provide additional stability

2OMe.rationale: Complete modification prevents passenger strand activity

PS.rationale: 5' terminal PS linkages reduce passenger strand loading

overhang.rationale: DNA overhangs with PS modifications if needed

notes: Pattern similar to FDA-approved therapeutic siRNAs
Suitable for in vivo efficacy and toxicology studies
Higher cost justified for therapeutic development
May require lipid nanoparticle or GalNAc delivery
Consult with synthesis provider for feasibility
